product.title: Hampton Cream - Translucent Pleated Skylight Blind
product.description: Their pleated hampton range, comes in light neutral shades. Perfect for sprucing up your loft or conservatory without the light loss from blackout fabric. A screen fabric, this faric is great for getting some uv protection without sacrificing natural light. Product id: db-pls0112 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

relproducts.title: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this hampton dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows.

relproducts.title: Skye Grace Ivory (Blackout)
relproducts.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows.
